EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Quote Request Confirmation
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name_c},
Thank you for your interest in our products! We’ve already started working on your price and availability request. Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
RFQ Status
You can track the status of this quote, and all of your quotes, online by visiting Honeywell’s Quote Status.
>> As we work to prepare your estimate, we’d like to tell you about a new quoting system that will make this process you just used look like a relic of the past. Honeywell has shifted from an email-based quoting system to an easy, fast portal-based system. While an email quote-request can sit for up to 12 hours before someone sees it, quote requests and orders made through myaerospace.com begin instantly.
Questions
We’ve connected all of your quote details through the subject line of this email. That subject line was created specifically for you and is unique to this quote. So, please leave the subject line unchanged should you reply to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again, we appreciate your business!
Best regards, Honeywell Quote Request Team
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
